name: Two Legs
description:
• Features of the game:
  • You have to jump a lot
  • Shoot your opponents a lot
  • Lifting in up
  • Below you will find red hot spikes moving up
  • It's raining on the level

The main character is a frog that can jump, shoot and teleport! Who is the main enemy of the frog? Perch, yes perch! But the perch cannot come to the surface. Dangerous mechanical robots under the control of a perch are placed on the level, and a special danger is coming from below!
